title: Off-duty cop beaten to death over property dispute
content:
An off-duty policeman was beaten to death over a property dispute in at Vitharandeniya in Tangalle last night (17), police said.
The 34-year-old constable had been attached to the Kasagala interchange on the southern expressway.According to the police, an ongoing hotel project near his home was at the centre of the dispute.
The man was fatally attacked with sharp objects by a group that also caused injuries to his brother.The wounded man is receiving treatment at the Karapitiya Teaching Hospital.
